list.title: Alice in border land
list.information: A group of bored delinquents are transported to a parallel dimension as part of a survival game.

list.title: The Girl from Nowhere
list.information: An internal succession war within House Targaryen at the height of its power, 172 years before the birth of Daenerys Targaryen.

list.title: Arcane
list.information: An internal succession war within House Targaryen at the height of its power, 172 years before the birth of Daenerys Targaryen.

list.title: House of the Dragon
list.information: An internal succession war within House Targaryen at the height of its power, 172 years before the birth of Daenerys Targaryen.

list.title: Wednesday
list.information: Follows Wednesday Addams' years as a student, when she attempts to master her emerging psychic ability, thwart a killing spree, and solve the mystery that embroiled her parents.

list.title: Squid Game
list.information: Hundreds of cash-strapped players accept a strange invitation to compete in children's games. Inside, a tempting prize awaits with deadly high stakes. A survival game that has a whopping 45.6 billion-won prize at stake.

list.title: The Dark Knight
list.information: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

list.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
list.information: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

list.title: Transformers: Age of Extinction
list.information: When humanity allies with a bounty hunter in pursuit of Optimus Prime, the Autobots turn to a mechanic and his family for help.

list.title: Godzilla
list.information: The world is beset by the appearance of monstrous creatures, but one of them may be the only one who can save humanity.

list.title: Avatar: The Way of Water
list.information: Jake Sully lives with his newfound family formed on the extrasolar moon Pandora. Once a familiar threat returns to finish what was previously started, Jake must work with Neytiri and the army of the Na'vi race to protect their home.

list.title: Ironman
list.information: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.
